Sentencas: This paper address the blocking of the electronic conductivity for a BaCe0.8Pr0.2O3-delta (BCP) material due to the addition of a BaCe0.4Zr0.4Y0.2O3-delta (BCZY) thin layer.
Titulo: Study of BaCe0.4Zr0.4Y0.2O3-δ/BaCe0.8Pr0.2O3-δ (BCZY/BCP) bilayer membrane for Protonic Conductor Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (PC-SOFC)

Sentencas: Barium cerates (BCP and BCZY) show interesting features as electrolytes for Proton Conducting Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (PC-SOFC).
Titulo: Study of BaCe0.4Zr0.4Y0.2O3-δ/BaCe0.8Pr0.2O3-δ (BCZY/BCP) bilayer membrane for Protonic Conductor Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (PC-SOFC)

Sentencas: BCP perovskite displays good mechanical properties associated to its sintering capability, typically proposed as a possible electrolyte.
Titulo: Study of BaCe0.4Zr0.4Y0.2O3-δ/BaCe0.8Pr0.2O3-δ (BCZY/BCP) bilayer membrane for Protonic Conductor Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (PC-SOFC)

Sentencas: However, this compound shows poor CO2 tolerance above 500 degrees C and presents mixed conductivity under wet synthetic air.
Titulo: Study of BaCe0.4Zr0.4Y0.2O3-δ/BaCe0.8Pr0.2O3-δ (BCZY/BCP) bilayer membrane for Protonic Conductor Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (PC-SOFC)

Sentencas: Protonic transport is the main feature of BCZY perovskite and it presents an excellent CO2 tolerance.
Titulo: Study of BaCe0.4Zr0.4Y0.2O3-δ/BaCe0.8Pr0.2O3-δ (BCZY/BCP) bilayer membrane for Protonic Conductor Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (PC-SOFC)

Sentencas: However, the drawback of this compound is its high grain boundary resistance.
Titulo: Study of BaCe0.4Zr0.4Y0.2O3-δ/BaCe0.8Pr0.2O3-δ (BCZY/BCP) bilayer membrane for Protonic Conductor Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (PC-SOFC)

Sentencas: In this work, a BCZY film was grown by Pulsed Laser Deposition (PLD) on BCP in order to block its electronic conductivity and improve CO2 tolerance.
Titulo: Study of BaCe0.4Zr0.4Y0.2O3-δ/BaCe0.8Pr0.2O3-δ (BCZY/BCP) bilayer membrane for Protonic Conductor Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (PC-SOFC)

Sentencas: From the electrochemical characterization of materials, it is proposed that BCP dominates transport mechanisms on the BCZY/BCP bilayer membranes under wet synthetic air and wet diluted hydrogen.
Titulo: Study of BaCe0.4Zr0.4Y0.2O3-δ/BaCe0.8Pr0.2O3-δ (BCZY/BCP) bilayer membrane for Protonic Conductor Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (PC-SOFC)

Sentencas: Our measurements confirm that the BCZY film blocks the electronic conductivity of BCP under wet synthetic air and protects it from CO2-containig atmospheres.
Titulo: Study of BaCe0.4Zr0.4Y0.2O3-δ/BaCe0.8Pr0.2O3-δ (BCZY/BCP) bilayer membrane for Protonic Conductor Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (PC-SOFC)

Sentencas: Due to this set of properties, the BCZY/BCP bilayer membrane represents a possible candidate as electrolyte for PC-SOFC operating between 400 and 600 degrees C. (C) 2019
Titulo: Study of BaCe0.4Zr0.4Y0.2O3-δ/BaCe0.8Pr0.2O3-δ (BCZY/BCP) bilayer membrane for Protonic Conductor Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (PC-SOFC)
